Description_lang: Increases your critical strike chance by $s4% and critical strike damage by $s5% for $d.Reduces the cooldown of your Aimed Shot and Rapid Fire by ${100*(1-(100/(100+$m1)))}%.$?a260404[Consuming Spotter's Mark reduces the cooldown of Trueshot by ${$260404s1/1000}.1 sec][]
AuraDescription_lang: Critical strike chance increased by $s4% and critical strike damage increased by $s5%. The cooldown of Aimed Shot and Rapid Fire is reduced by ${100*(1-(100/(100+$m1)))}%.

description_blz.en_US:
Increases your critical strike chance by 10% and critical strike damage by 20% for 15 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of your Aimed Shot and Rapid Fire by 60%.
description_blz.es_MX:
Aumenta un 10% tu probabilidad de golpe crítico y un 20% el daño de golpe crítico durante 15 s.

Reduce un 60% el tiempo de reutilización de tu Disparo de puntería y Fuego rápido.
description_blz.pt_BR:
Aumenta em 10% sua chance de acerto crítico e em 20% seu dano de acerto crítico por 15 s.

Reduz em 60% a recarga do seu Tiro Certo e do seu Tiro Rápido.
description_blz.de_DE:
Erhöht 15 Sek. lang Eure kritische Trefferchance um 10% und Euren kritischen Schaden um 20%.

Verringert die Abklingzeit Eurer Fähigkeiten 'Gezielter Schuss' und 'Schnellfeuer' um 60%.
description_blz.en_GB:
Increases your critical strike chance by 10% and critical strike damage by 20% for 15 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of your Aimed Shot and Rapid Fire by 60%.
description_blz.es_ES:
Aumenta un 10% tu probabilidad de golpe crítico y un 20% el daño crítico durante 15 s.

Reduce un 60% el tiempo de reutilización de tu Disparo de puntería y Fuego rápido.
description_blz.fr_FR:
Augmente vos chances de coup critique de 10 % et vos dégâts critiques de 20 % pendant 15 s.

Réduit le temps de recharge de vos techniques Visée et Tir rapide de 60 %.
description_blz.it_IT:
Aumenta la probabilità di critico del 10% e i danni critici inflitti del 20% per 15 s.

Riduce il tempo di recupero di Tiro Mirato e Rapidità di Tiro del 60%.
description_blz.ru_RU:
Повышает вероятность критического удара на 10% и увеличивает критический урон на 20% на 15 сек.

Сокращает время восстановления "Прицельного выстрела" и "Быстрой стрельбы" на 60%.
description_blz.ko_KR:
15초 동안 치명타 및 극대화율이 10%만큼, 치명타 및 극대화 피해가 20%만큼 증가합니다.

조준 사격과 속사의 재사용 대기시간이 60%만큼 감소합니다.
description_blz.zh_TW:
使你的致命一擊機率提高10%，致命一擊傷害提高20%，持續15秒。

使你瞄準射擊和急速射擊的冷卻時間縮短60%。
description_blz.zh_CN:
使你的爆击几率提高10%且爆击伤害提高20%，持续15秒。

瞄准射击和急速射击的冷却时间缩短60%。
